name: I Need A Doctor!
description:
I Need A Doctor! is a third person action game developed by 10 students as the capstone project for Mercer County Community College's Game Design degree.

The objective of the game is simple: you're bleeding to death and you need medical attention immediately. The only problem, besides bleeding profusely, is that you've been dropped off at the worst hospital imaginable- there's only one doctor in the entire facility and it's crawling with infectious gases that will hasten your already rapidly-decaying state.

It's not all bad though, there are 4 different types of power-ups that you can find scattered throughout the randomly-generated hospital to aid you on your quest to find the elusive doctor.

Good Luck, and we hope you enjoy the game!

Please feel free to send any comments or questions to RaymondHess3@Gmail.com

Music Credit: "George Street Shuffle" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
